articles.title: Asian woman, 94, stabbed multiple times in San Francisco - NBC News
articles.description: Anh Taylor, 94, was found with multiple stab wounds and taken to the hospital in San Francisco, police said. She is expected to survive.
articles.content:
A man who was released from jail earlier this month was arrested in connection with an "unprovoked" stabbing of a 94-year-old Asian woman in San Francisco, authorities said Wednesday.

articles.title: Singapore loses its top spot in global competitiveness study, now ranks 5th - The Straits Times
articles.description: But the Republic remains Asia's top performing economy. . Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:

articles.author: Delfin Dioquino
articles.title: Korea quashes Indonesia to bounce back from Gilas Pilipinas loss - Rappler
articles.description: Korea gets back on track from its shocking loss to Gilas Pilipinas as it demolishes Indonesia in the FIBA Asia Cup Qualifiers
articles.content: As things stand, the Philippines (4-0) has 8 points, Korea (3-1) has 7 points, Indonesia (1-3) has 5 points, while Thailand (0-4) has 4 points.
